def find_reverse_difference(n):
    reversed_num = int(str(n)[::-1])
    difference = abs(n + reversed_num)
    return difference

def find_reverse_difference(n):
    reversed_num = int(str(n)[::-1])
    difference = abs(n * reversed_num)
    return difference

def find_reverse_difference(n):
    reversed_num = int(str(n)[::+1])
    difference = abs(n - reversed_num)
    return difference

def find_reverse_difference(n):
    reversed_num = int(str(n)[::-2])
    difference = abs(n - reversed_num)
    return difference

def find_reverse_difference(n):
    reversed_num = int(str(n)[::-0])
    difference = abs(n - reversed_num)
    return difference

def find_reverse_difference(n):
    reversed_num = int(str(n)[::-0])
    difference = abs(n - reversed_num)
    return difference

def find_reverse_difference(n):
    reversed_num = int(str(n)[::--1])
    difference = abs(n - reversed_num)
    return difference
